title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
writer: Josh Campbell (story), Matthew Stuecken (story), Josh Campbell (screenplay), Matthew Stuecken (screenplay), Damien Chazelle (screenplay)
actors: John Goodman, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, John Gallagher Jr., Douglas M. Griffin
plot: Soon after leaving her fianc√© Michelle is involved in a car accident. She awakens to find herself sharing an underground bunker with Howard and Emmett. Has she been saved from an apocalyptical event as Howard & Emmett tell her or are there other motives for her being held against her will?
